attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe the tv license is flawed. as to the rights of the bbc being able to collect, advertising revenue from the UK TV Channels, you tube, also camelot is a plc company, either collect advertising revenue or the license fee not both. i believe the bbc are are corrupt company and should be made to be more open to the public

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
